title: Ticket #4472: Schedd Restart Testing
description: Todd T found a schedd restart issue on windows causing a revisit to these tests. They were way out of date and spread across4-5 files each. The one with running jobs was turned off and broken. Also there was no really basic job where on the off and then on of the schedd was tested. Our own need for this combined with a ratheon complaint s8455 of queue corruption on windows reboots led to test and by hand testing
